name: 4th Global Congress on Innovations in Physiotherapy & Rehabilitation Medicine
content: On behalf of the International Organizing Committee of the 4th Global Congress on Innovations in Physiotherapy & Rehabilitation Medicine, we are delighted to invite and welcome you all to this exciting conference in the beautiful city of London. Join us to learn, network and explore from from June 16-17, 2025 in London, United Kingdom. The theme: Rehabilitation Reimagined: Pioneering the Future of Physiotherapy. These innovations and solutions will be presented in the form of lectures, from eminent speakers from across the world, scientific poster presentations, and a young researchers forum.
